sub_title: Executive Assistant to SVP and General Manager EMEAR at Here Technologies
summary:
Experienced Executive & Personal Assistant with Project and Event Management and Leadership skills:

Executive & Personal Assistant to the Senior Vice President.

Manager of the Executive Administration department (cross channel team, Direct & Digital & Contract Europe), managing and motivating a team consisting of one Executive Assistant and one Management Assistant. 

Project & Event Management: gathering funds for various project & events (vendor conferences, sales kick off meetings, internal projects. 

Acting as a liaison for customers, shareholders, vendors, executives, managers, staff and Dutch works council.

Significant qualities: Thinking outside the box, good organisational and people skills, business acumen, result-driven, flexible, no 9 - 5 mentality, welcomes a challenge.

Specialism: executive support, project and event management, leadership.
